entry.description: By Mike Suding. For more info, see http://blog.mikesuding.com/index.php/2018/07/19/office365

attribute.name: scriptgroovy
attribute.value:
//Account variables String VarAccessId = hostProps.get("Office365.LM.Id") String VarAccessKey = hostProps.get("Office365.LM.Key") String VarAccount = hostProps.get("lm.account")
String VarDeviceIdProperty = hostProps.get("system.deviceid") String VarOffice365Tenant = hostProps.get("Office365.Tenant") String VarApplicationID = hostProps.get("Office365.AppID.key")
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper import org.apache.commons.codec.binary.Hex import org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpGet import org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpPost import org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpPatch import org.apache.http.entity.StringEntity import org.apache.http.impl.client.CloseableHttpClient import org.apache.http.impl.client.HttpClients import org.apache.http.util.EntityUtils import javax.crypto.Mac import javax.crypto.spec.SecretKeySpec
String GetAccessToken (String Account, String AccessId, String AccessKey, String DeviceID, String Office365Tenant, String ApplicationID) { ResourcePath = "/device/devices/$DeviceID/properties" FilterString = "?filter=name~Office365*" Url = "https://" + Account + ".logicmonitor.com" + "/santaba/rest" + ResourcePath + FilterString epoch = System.currentTimeMillis() requestVars = "GET" + epoch + ResourcePath hmac = Mac.getInstance("HmacSHA256") secret = new SecretKeySpec(AccessKey.getBytes(), "HmacSHA256") hmac.init(secret) hmac_signed = Hex.encodeHexString(hmac.doFinal(requestVars.getBytes())) signature = hmac_signed.bytes.encodeBase64() CloseableHttpClient httpclient = HttpClients.createDefault() httpGet = new HttpGet(Url) httpGet.addHeader("Authorization" , "LMv1 " + AccessId + ":" + signature + ":" + epoch) httpResponse = httpclient.execute(httpGet) ResponseBody = EntityUtils.toString(httpResponse.getEntity()) code = httpResponse.getStatusLine().getStatusCode() httpclient.close()
JsonSlurperParser = new JsonSlurper() ResponseObject = JsonSlurperParser.parseText(ResponseBody)
Office365GraphApiTokenExpires = (ResponseObject.data.items.find {it.name == "Office365.GraphAPI.TokenExpires"}).value Office365GraphApiAccessToken = (ResponseObject.data.items.find {it.name == "Office365.GraphAPI.AccessToken"}).value Office365GraphApiRefreshToken = hostProps.get("Office365.GraphAPI.RefreshToken.key")
CurrentSeconds = System.currentTimeSeconds()
if (Office365GraphApiTokenExpires.toLong() - CurrentSeconds < 120) { Url = "https://login.windows.net/$Office365Tenant/oauth2/token"
ResourcePath = "https://graph.microsoft.com" RedirectUriPath = "urn:ietf:wg:oauth:2.0:oob"
Body = "resource=$ResourcePath&client_id=$ApplicationID&redirect_uri=$RedirectUriPath&grant_type=refresh_token&refresh_token=$Office365GraphApiRefreshToken" EncodedBody = new StringEntity(Body)
CloseableHttpClient UpdateTokenClient = HttpClients.createDefault() httpPost = new HttpPost(Url) httpPost.setHeader("Content-type","application/x-www-form-urlencoded") httpPost.setEntity(EncodedBody) httpResponse = UpdateTokenClient.execute(httpPost)
ResponseBody = EntityUtils.toString(httpResponse.getEntity())
code = httpResponse.getStatusLine().getStatusCode() UpdateTokenClient.close()
JsonSlurperParser = new JsonSlurper() ResponseObject = JsonSlurperParser.parseText(ResponseBody)
Office365GraphApiTokenExpires = ResponseObject.expires_on Office365GraphApiAccessToken = ResponseObject.access_token Office365GraphApiRefreshToken = ResponseObject.refresh_token
//Update device properties ResourcePath = "/device/devices/$DeviceID" QueryParams = '?patchFields=customProperties&opType=replace' Url = "https://" + Account + ".logicmonitor.com" + "/santaba/rest" + ResourcePath + QueryParams epoch = System.currentTimeMillis() UpdateData = '{"customProperties":[{"name":"Office365.GraphAPI.TokenExpires","value":"' + Office365GraphApiTokenExpires + '"},{"name":"Office365.GraphAPI.RefreshToken.key","value":"' + Office365GraphApiRefreshToken + '"},{"name":"Office365.GraphAPI.AccessToken","value":"' + Office365GraphApiAccessToken + '"}]}' params = new StringEntity(UpdateData)
requestVars = "PATCH" + epoch + UpdateData + ResourcePath
hmac = Mac.getInstance("HmacSHA256") secret = new SecretKeySpec(AccessKey.getBytes(), "HmacSHA256") hmac.init(secret) hmac_signed = Hex.encodeHexString(hmac.doFinal(requestVars.getBytes())) signature = hmac_signed.bytes.encodeBase64()
httpclient = HttpClients.createDefault() httpPatch = new HttpPatch(Url) httpPatch.addHeader("Authorization" , "LMv1 " + AccessId + ":" + signature + ":" + epoch) httpPatch.setHeader("Accept", "application/json") httpPatch.setHeader("Content-type", "application/json") httpPatch.setEntity(params) httpResponse = httpclient.execute(httpPatch) ResponseBody = EntityUtils.toString(httpResponse.getEntity()) code = httpResponse.getStatusLine().getStatusCode() httpclient.close()
return Office365GraphApiAccessToken } else { return Office365GraphApiAccessToken } }
def GetAppActivityByUsers (String Token) { Url = "https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/reports/getEmailAppUsageUserCounts(period='D7')"
httpclient = HttpClients.createDefault() httpGet = new HttpGet(Url) httpGet.addHeader("Authorization" , "Bearer " + Token) httpResponse = httpclient.execute(httpGet)
ResponseBody = EntityUtils.toString(httpResponse.getEntity()) httpclient.close()
return ResponseBody }
AccessToken = GetAccessToken (VarAccount, VarAccessId, VarAccessKey, VarDeviceIdProperty, VarOffice365Tenant, VarApplicationID)
ActivityByItems = GetAppActivityByUsers (AccessToken)
ItemsActivityArray = ActivityByItems.split("\r\n")
ApplicationActivityData = ItemsActivityArray[7].split(",")
println ("MailForMac=${(ApplicationActivityData[1].isEmpty() ? "0" : ApplicationActivityData[1])}") println ("OutlookForMac=${(ApplicationActivityData[2].isEmpty() ? "0" : ApplicationActivityData[2])}") println ("OutlookForWindows=${(ApplicationActivityData[3].isEmpty() ? "0" : ApplicationActivityData[3])}") println ("OutlookForMobile=${(ApplicationActivityData[4].isEmpty() ? "0" : ApplicationActivityData[4])}") println ("OutlookForWeb=${(ApplicationActivityData[5].isEmpty() ? "0" : ApplicationActivityData[5])}") println ("POP3App=${(ApplicationActivityData[6].isEmpty() ? "0" : ApplicationActivityData[6])}") println ("IMAP4App=${(ApplicationActivityData[7].isEmpty() ? "0" : ApplicationActivityData[7])}") println ("SMTPApp=${(ApplicationActivityData[8].isEmpty() ? "0" : ApplicationActivityData[8])}")
